name: From TV Animation Slam Dunk: I Love Basketball
overview: Slam Dunk is based on the popular manga/anime of the same title, created by Takehiko Inoue. The game follows the story of Sakuragi Hanamichi, a high school delinquent, as he joins a basketball team in an attempt to win the heart of a young woman. The story follows the same plot as the anime/manga and progresses between basketball matches as you progress through the story mode. Also available is a versus mode, where two players can play against each other using the pre-set teams or by mixing and matching players into their own personal dream team.
